pr_title: Add JUnit Platform JFR in Dependency Metadata and Diagram

timeline.message:
Add JUnit Platform JFR in Dependency Metadata and Diagram

This commit also removes the dependency metadata from the README.md
file and replaces it with a link to the user guide instead.

Addresses part of #2403

timeline.bodyText: How about something like "Provides a Java Flight Recorder TestExecutionListener for the JUnit Platform" or "Provides a TestExecutionListener for Java Flight Recorder events on the JUnit Platform"?
timeline.author: sbrannen
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -39,6 +39,8 @@ artifacts are deployed to Sonatype's {snapshot-repo}[snapshots repository] under
     directory. See <<running-tests-console-launcher>> for details.
   `junit-platform-engine`::
     Public API for test engines. See <<launcher-api-engines-custom>> for details.
+  `junit-platform-jfr`::
+    Provides the JUnit Platform Flight Recording Listener. See <<running-tests-flight-recorder>> for details.
